FuncDef: The display dhcpv6 relay prefix-delegation command displays the DHCPv6 PD routing information forwarded by the DHCPv6 Relay. The display dhcpv6 relay prefix-delegation command displays the DHCPv6 PD routing information forwarded by the DHCPv6 Relay. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display dhcpv6 relay prefix-delegation { client [ interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interface-name> } ] | route [ interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interface-name> } ] }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about DHCPv6 PD clients.
-

Specifies the interface type and interface number.
-

Displays routing information learned from DHCPv6 PD clients.
-
